titles: Lucans Pharsalia: or The ciuill warres of Rome, betweene Pompey the great, and Iulius Cæsar The whole tenne bookes, Englished by Thomas May, Esquire.
author: Lucan, 39-65.
May, Thomas, 1595-1650.
Hulsius, Friedrich van, b. 1580, engraver.
publisher: Printed by Aug. Mathewes, for Thomas Iones, and are to be sold at his shop in St. Dunstanes Church-yard,
notes: With an additional title page, engraved, omitting the printer's name and signed: Fridericus Hulsius sculps:.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
keywords: Pharsalus, Battle of, 48 B.C. --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
